If anyone knows more than that about this mod, post in this thread :slight_smile:

item.description:
Have you heard about how shit CS:Z is? Why would anyone want to play the same thing but with slightly better looking graphics?

Read full topic

item.title: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes: Source
item.dc:creator: flyaway888
item.description:
steve-o:

Greetings; I am Steve-o, a member of CZ: S (Condition Zero: Source) Source 2007 Engine modification.

This is not our mod: https://www.moddb.com/mods/counter-st…ndition-source
You only have to read the description for it to tell you that it’s a mod which turns the Goldsource CS into CSS.

We are working on CZ: S privately for the time-being until we have a satifactory amount of content to show the public.

This is our site: https://cstactics.net/

and…

Our forums: https://forums.cstactics.net/

and…

Our Moddb page: https://www.moddb.com/mods/csobunnamed

We are soon to be making our mod official / public, so keep your eyes on our mod

-Steve

So it is real like I said before, have you heard about Thomas the unbeliever?

Read full topic

item.title: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes: Source
item.dc:creator: SwampFox56
item.description:
steve-o:

We’re making multiplayer, singleplayer, and adding new weapons. I don’t know if that’ll excite you, but I just forgot to add it to my previous post. Oh, and CSS is not required to play; we’re remaking all CSS content, so that’ll probably lure in non-CSS owners.

Also, I know that Opposing force 2 (I was in that team for a while) is being made by another mod team, and I think Blue Shift is as well. So that narrows our options down.

Besides, who doesn’t love an updated version of CSS that is like CS 1.6 + CZ with some other extra stuff?

well i wish you guys luck, and i look forward to play the game when its done

Read full topic

item.title: Condition Zero Deleted Scenes: Source
item.dc:creator: steve-o
item.description:
SwampFox56:

as cool as that sounds…CZ was a pretty shitty game in the first place. if i was you, i would remake OPFOR or blue shift, then i might get excited

We’re making multiplayer, singleplayer, and adding new weapons. I don’t know if that’ll excite you, but I just forgot to add it to my previous post. Oh, and CSS is not required to play; we’re remaking all CSS content, so that’ll probably lure in non-CSS owners.

Also, I know that Opposing force 2 (I was in that team for a while) is being made by another mod team, and I think Blue Shift is as well. So that narrows our options down.

Besides, who doesn’t love an updated version of CSS that is like CS 1.6 + CZ with some other extra stuff?

Read full topic
